alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Spokane (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 21 at 11:10AM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 PM PDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of East Central and Northeast Washington, including the following counties, in East Central Washington, Lincoln. In Northeast Washington, Spokane. * WHEN...Until 215 PM PDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1109 AM PDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Radar estimated rainfall in the last hour is 0.50 to 0.75 inches. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Cheney, Medical Lake, Davenport, Fairchild AFB, Reardan, Waukon, Eleanor, Edwall, Tyler, Gravelles, Deep Creek, Mondovi and Amber. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
